serverConfigHelp.title: Server Config Area
serverConfigHelp.desc: Here iz where u can change teh configuration of your server (Character break dis importantz)
perms: It iz recommended 2 NOT change teh peths of a servr managed by Cwafty. DIS IS BAD JUJU
Changing peths CAN break things, especially on Linux typ operatin systems where file permissions are more locked down.
If u feel u hav 2 change where a server iz located u may do so as long as you give teh "crafty" user permission to read / write to teh server peth.
On Linux dis iz best done by executing teh following:

buttons.copyKeys:
Press ctrl or u2318 + C to copy teh table data to your system clipboard.

To cancel, click this message or press escape.

rows.0: Click on a row to select it

cells.0: Click on a cel to select it

columns.0: Click on a column to select it
